body.p: The help system uses a hypertext system (like web pages) to navigate through the different files and topics.
Links are normally displayed like this, in a light grey colour (or gray color, depending), unless they are currently selected, in which case they look like this (green).
When you reach the top or bottom of a page, it will stop scrolling. When the last link on a page is selected and you try to move on a link, it will "loop" up to the first, and vice-versa.
The normal keys you will need to know are:

list.item: Escape (ESC) allows you to leave help at any time.
Question mark (?) will return you to the previous help file.
Dot (.) moves you down a line.
Greater than (>) moves you down a page.
Semi-colon (;) moves you up a line.
Colon (:) moves you up a page.
Return activates the currently selected link.
